resources.string: Quiz Time
Hello blank fragment
Q1) A station in a network forwards incoming packets by placing them on its shortest output queue. What routing algorithm is being used? \nAnswer: hot potato routing

Q2) The probability that a single bit will be in error on a typical public telephone line using 4800 bps modem is 10 to the power -3. If no error detection mechanism is used, the residual error rate for a communication line using 9-bit frames is approximately equal to \nAnswer: 0.009
Q3) Frames from one LAN can be transmitted to anoth... \nAnswer: Bridge

Q4) You have a class A network address 10.0.0.0 with 40 subnets, but are required to add 60 new subnets very soon. You would like to still allow for the largest possible number of host IDs per subnet. Which subnet mask should you assign?\nAnswer:255.254.0.0
Q5) What are the most commonly used transmission speeds in BPS used in data communication?/nAnswer: 9600
Q6) What is the default subnet mask for a class C network?\nAnswer: 255.255.255.0
Q7) Which of the following is used for modulation and demodulation?\nAnswer: modem
Q8) Which of the following is not a disadvantage of wireless LAN? \nAnswer: All of the above

Q9) Your company has a LAN in its downtown office and has now set up a LAN in the manufacturing plant in the suburbs. To enable everyone to share data and resources between the two LANs, what type of device(s) are needed to connect them? Choose the most correct answer.\nAnswer: "Router"
Q10) How many hosts are attached to each of the local area networks at your site?\nAnswer: 254
Q1) Which instrument is used to measure altitudes in aircraft ? \nAnswe: Altimeter
Q2) Which instrument is used to measure depth of ocean ? \nAnswer: Fathometer
Q3) Name of the instrument to measure atomspheric pressure ? \nAnswer: Barometer
Q4) Which instrument is used to measure the power of electric circuit ? \nAnswer: Wattmeter
Q5) Which instrument is used in submarine to see the objects above sea level ? \nAnswer: Periscope
Q6) Which instrument is used in submarine to see the objects above sea level ? \nAnswer: Periscope
Q7) Which instrument is used to measure curvature of spherical objects ? \Answer: Spherometer
Q8) Which instrument is used to record physical happenings at a distant place ? \nAnswer: Telemeter
Q9) Which instrument is used to measure the scattering of light by particles suspended in a liquid ? \nAnswer: Nephetometer
Q10) Which instrument is used to determine the intensity of colours ? \nAnswer: Colorimeter
Q11) Which instrument is used to measure changes in volume of substances ? \nAnswer: Dilatometer
Q1) He did not give up fight even though he was badly bruised. \nAnswer: The fight was not given up by him even though he was badly bruised.
Q2) Which poem ends "I shall but love thee better after death"? \nAnswer: How do I love thee
Q3) Which kind of poem is Edward Lear associated with? \nAnswer: Nonsense
Q4) In 1960 "The Colossus" was the first book of poems published by which poetess? \nAnswer: Sylvia Plath
Q5) Which is an example of a proverb? \nAnswer: You cannot have your cake and eat it, too
Q6) in which language the stories of canterbury tale are written? \nAnswer: Middle english
Q7) How many languages did chaucer know?\nAnswer: 4
Q8) Who was the first English Christian king?\n Answer: Ethelbert
Q9) Which century is known as Dawn of Renaissance:\nAnswer: 14 th and 16 th
Q10) Who born in 1422:\nAnswer: William Caxton
Q1) মিথিলা ও বাংলার মিশ্রণে যে ভাষা সৃষ্টি—\nAnswer: ব্রজবুলি
Q2) ‘নসীরানামা’ কাব্যগ্রন্থর রচয়িতা কে? \nAnswer: মরদন
Q3) ‘টালা অভিনয়’—কি ধরনের গ্রন্থ? \nAnswer; নাটক
Q4) ‘মানব মুকুট’ গ্রন্থটির রচয়িতা কে? \nAnswer: এয়াকুব আলী চৌধুরী
Q5) বাংলা লিপির উৎস কী? \nAnswer: ব্রাহ্মী লিপি
Q6) ‘প্রাকৃত’ শব্দটির অর্থ কী? \nAnswer: স্বাভাবিক
Q7) শরৎচন্দ্র চট্টোপাধ্যায়ের শ্রেষ্ঠ রচনা কোনটি? \nAnswer: শ্রীকান্ত
Q8) প্রথম সার্থক নাটক কোনটি? \nAnswer: শর্মিষ্ঠা
Q9) কোনটি দীনবন্ধুর মিত্রের রচনা? \nAnswer: কমলে কামিনী
Q10) ‘ভাষাবোধ বাঙ্গালা ব্যাকরণ’ কার লেখা? \nAnswer: নকুলেশ্বর বিদ্যাভূষণ
